_header: When that in old time by ancient antiquity

CamFitzMc182.First Lines:
Whan that in old tym by awnsyent antyquetyTrubulis of weres than
                    wer in exersie…
CamFitzMc182.Last Lines:
…To retire for trus and yt many tymes desirffor all ther
                    worthy[n]es this th[e]i dyd requyr
CamFitzMc182.Editions:
Edwards,  A. S. G. 
             “Stanzas on Troy.” 
             English Language Notes
         7 (1969-70): 246-8: 247-8.
